Key:
(I was so happy... But I still couldn't believe it, so I
asked again. Then I regretted it a little, thinking that
it might have sounded rude.)

(I was able to be by Shido's side once again.
Honestly, that alone was a miracle. Because I should
have already disappeared, and have once before.)

(I couldn't give you happiness... But is it okay for
me to receive so much happiness from you...?)

(Observing Shido, I can tell, even without having any
powers. This Eden is coming to an end.)

(I think that Shido inviting me on a date means that
he's going to give the time he has left to me.)

(A date with me... not with Maria-chan, Marina-san,
or Rio-chan, but me. If you treat me so specially...
I'll get the wrong idea.)

(Even if it's an emotion planted in a fake world, I
was happy. It was really nice to be thought of by
Shido. So it won't hurt to enjoy today right?)

(And I'm going to tell him. This time, I'm not going
to say it and run. I want to hear his answer.)

(Hey, Shido? You're always so kind. And that's...
what I love about you.)

(This time, I want to tell him. Because I feel like that
would be the only thing I can give him.)
Oh, you ready? Let's head out, then.
Okay. Sorry for making you wait.

I didn't wait at all. Actually, I feel like you got ready
really quickly.
I told you I'd be right back. I keep my word.
You're amazing as always, Rinne.
It's nothing out of the ordinary.
Anyways, where are we going today?
I guess we can start off by shopping.

Hahaha. That's like what we usually do rather than
going on a date.

Oh... You have a point. But I think even then, it's
fine. As long as it's the two of us.
I see. If it's the two of us, huh... You may be right.
Here, Rinne.
Um... What?
(I offered my hand, and Rinne stared intently at it.)

I promised you, didn't I? I'm going to escort you
today.
...Okay!
Then please do, Prince Charming.

Oh, come on... What's up with the Prince Charming
thing... I'm not like that.

No. For me... And I'm sure for Tohka-chan and
Maria-chan, you're Prince Charming.

Um... You're making me blush. Then what would you
be, Rinne? A princess?

I don't want to be a princess. I want to be an
ordinary girl.

Haha. That's so like you Rinne. But I think you can be
a princess for just today.

Hehe... You're right. If you're a prince, Shido, that
works for me.
All right, let's go.
Hehehe. Let's.

(I can feel Rinne's warmth through my hand. I don't
want to let her go. I sincerely feel this way.)
Okay. I promise you I'll make this date fun.
Got it. I look forward to it.
Leave it to me!

(Rinne and I held hands as we walked the usual path,
just the two of us. The time that should have
stopped felt like it was starting to move again.)
...Hey Rinne. Aren't you buying too much?

You think so? I usually don't buy things for myself,
so... I guess I was starting to get carried away with
it.

Oh, come to think of it, we've never shopped like this
before, have we?

Gosh. That's because you've never treated me like a
girl.
Oh... Well, I did see you as family.

That's makes me happy on its own, but... I wish you'd
understand a girl more.
Well, I think that's hard for men.

Really... I'd beg to differ if we're talking about the
Shido from the Tenou Festival.

O-Oh... Well, about that... There was the whole Miku
thing, and I had no choice...

I heard from Kotori-chan later that you went to
school without Miku-san's incident being related.
Well, that too, um...
I want to see it someday... Shiori-chan, that is.
Oh, sorry. Please... Seriously, anything but that.

(I feel I'm walking down a dangerous path as it is.
There is no way in hell I would show it to Rinne.)

Hehe... Then you'd best study a girl's heart more.
You hear me?
Okay, fine...

(You can't escape an urgent problem without making
some sacrifices. It's to protect something important
of mine. That's what I told myself.)

Well, Mr. Girl Expert. Please tell me your opinion of
this outfit.

I think it's a cute blouse. That bright color looks
good on you, Rinne.
Thanks. Then I'm going to buy this, too.
Okay... What, you're going to buy more?!
I never said I was going to stop earlier.

Yeah but... Keep it to a minimum, okay? If it's too
much, it'll be hard to walk.

Right. But that's a little unfortunate... I always
wanted to buy so much that I couldn't see in front
of myself. You know, like in a lot of mangas.

Hey... Aren't those the ones where the guy's carrying
everything?! Please, not that...
(Our date is going to be just shopping...)
Okaaay. Well, let me pay and we'll go to the next shop.
Okay... Wait, you're still going to buy more?!

(Despite my protests, Rinne answered with the biggest
smile.)
I think this is the first time I've bought so much.

As long as you're satisfied, that's all that matters.
But you buy a lot more than Kotori. It was surprising.

Hahaha... Sorry, I couldn't help it. But if you're my
prince charming, you'll forgive me, right?
What are you going to do if I say I won't forgive you?
I'll do this.
What...
Like this, Shido.

O-Okay. But what's going on? You're not acting like
yourself today.

(We were holding hands until we got to the shops,
but when Rinne initiated and took my hand, it felt so
different that I couldn't help but be thrown off.)

Because you're trying your best. I figured I'd also
try a little, too.
Rinne, does that mean...
Hey, look Shido! There's the crepe truck. Let's go!
H-Hey wait! Don't pull so hard!

Crepe is a date favorite, right? Let's eat it together,
Shido.

Okay, okay, you don't have to rush. The crepes won't
go anywhere. You're not Tohka...
Ahahaha... Sorry. I wasn't trying to copy Tohka-chan.

I know. Come on. We'll get there even if we walk
slowly.
Okay, got it.

(Rinne wasn't like her usual self. It seemed like she
wasn't holding back. Maybe that's what she meant
earlier. I couldn't tell.)

(But there's one thing I know. Rinne looks like she's
been having fun this whole time. And I know that's
happiness.)

It's my first time eating it all... Crepes are
delicious.

Oh, come to think of it, we've never eaten crepes
together, have we?
But you've eaten it with so many other girls, huh?

Hey, Rinne. Why do I sense a little bite when you
say it like that...? Anyway, I hope this makes up for it.
Unfortunately, interest has been accruing.
Don't say it with a smile.
But Shido, you're going to pay me back right?
Yeah. I'll pay you back double, triple.

Hahaha. Are you sure about that? I'm not going to let
you trick me like Tohka-chan.

I won't trick you. And besides... There's so much I
want to give back to you. What I'm doing now isn't
enough.
Hmm... I don't think you owe me that much though?

Oh, come on. I don't feel like I could ever pay you
back.

No, you already are though. Shido, you bring me so
much happiness.

(Rinne was so honest with her feelings that I was
at a loss for words. Rinne says she's happy with our
ordinary life. That made me so happy.)
Oh, right. It's almost lunchtime. What should we eat?

Is that something you should say right after eating
a crepe?!

That's one thing, this is another. They say you have
a separate stomach for sweets, right?
Well, I mean, I can eat but...

(Rinne is really similar to Tohka today. She gets so
happy about food... overly happy...)

You can feel so happy just by eating something
delicious.

It's true. Eating delicious food kinda feels...
fulfilling.
I know, right? So, let's go on a food journey!
I feel like you're totally losing sight of our goal.
Who cares. Will you come with me?
Of course. I'll follow you wherever you go, Princess.
Hahaha. Sorry for being such a spoiled princess.

Don't worry about it. The Prince always has a soft
spot for the princess.
Thank you, Shido.

But if I really were a princess... Then I'd be the
little mermaid.

(I heard Rinne mutter those words, and I gripped her
hand more tightly.)

Oh, this Neapolitan is so good... The ketchup doesn't
seem store-bought. I wonder if they made it in-
house?

This pepperoncino is delicious, too. It's very flavorful,
but not too overpowering.

Hey Shido? Is it okay to eat really strong flavors
like this on a date?

Oh... W-Well, it looked so delicious, I couldn't help
it.

Gosh... It's fine because you're with me, but you
can't do that with other girls.
Sorry... So you want a bite, Rinne?
N-No, thanks.

Oh come on. It smells so good, doesn't it? It'll be a
missed opportunity if you don't eat this.
You're trying to drag me down, aren't you?
Caught me.

Gosh, it's so obvious. Hmm I guess... I'll take one
bite. Why don't we feed each other?
F-Feed one another?!

I mean you seemed to want to try mine. And today...
we're on a date, right? Come on. Open wide.
O-Okay. Ahhh... *nom*.

Delicious!
You can't replicate this with store-bought ketchup!
It's so easy to eat.

Right? But I guess it's more for girls. Anyways, your
turn, Shido.
Oh, um... Open wide.
Ahhh... *nom*.

Oh, this is delicious too.
But I don't think I could eat too much of it.

I guess this flavoring is more for guys huh? It tastes
good, but I don't think I could serve this at home.
How unfortunate.

Well, your place has mostly female inhabitants. And
the visitors are mostly girls, too.
I know...

But Tohka-chan likes those kinds of dishes, so it
may be a good idea to make it next time.

You're right. I'll give it a shot... Sorry, we're on a
date, and we're talking about the food we eat at my
house.

No. I'm just happy to see you look like you're having
fun.

(I got a little self-conscious, so I looked away from
Rinne and focused on the pepperoncino. Oh... And I
also have to deal with my breath, too.)
Wow... This plushie is so cute.

(I looked at the plushie Rinne said was cute. It was
a Tengu-like mascot with two cow horns and black
wings. I guess the motif was the Karasu Tengu.)
Is that... cute?

It looks a little dinky, but don't you think that's
its charm?
Come to think of it, I guess...

"(More than that, what is up with this name, "Tengu
Cow-kun"... It's totally a gag name. Hm... but it
sounds familiar...?)"
I... have never seen this character before.
Me, neither. Maybe it's a mascot for Tengu City.
Um... I guess we can buy it?

How much is it... Wait, it's the size of my palm, but
it's 3,000 yen?!
That's a bit much...
It is...
Then I'm going to buy one thing that I was eyeing.
What? You're going to buy it?!

Nooo. The thing over there. It's a flower accessory.
I thought it was cute.

You're right. It is cute. Then I'll wait for you at the
entrance.
Okay. I'll head over as soon as I pay for this, okay?
You don't have to hurry.

Well the sun's setting, so I don't want to spend too
much time. And besides, I know which one I want to
buy.
Okay. I'll be waiting there, okay?
Okay. Thanks, Shido.

(The sun started to set, and the sky turned orange.
Rinne and I had come to Takadai.)
Why did you want to come here?

I think it's because this place has so many memories.
Maybe I just wanted to see the city where I was able
to spend time with you.
What do you mean?

We looked over it together last time, remember?
The view from this place.
...You're right. I remember.

I decided that I was going to forget everything and
just enjoy myself today. Not worrying about doing
anything that might make you hate me... All of it.

And I had so much fun. You were surprised, weren't
you? I wasn't acting like the usual me.

Um... Yeah. I guess I wasn't so much surprised as I
was happy.
Happy?

Yeah. I mean, I remember you were the Ruler. That
you're not just a good girl.

...Hehe. Hahah. You're right. You're totally right.
You know that I'm annoying, with a lot of baggage,
and I'm always meddling, too.
Don't say that about yourself.

But you shouldn't be talking, Shido. You're annoying,
with a lot of baggage, and you're always meddling.
...Well, I won't deny that.

(I mean I know it. I also think it's a flaw of mine.
But I can't just stand there when people are hurt.)
Hey, Shido... Have you found your answer yet?
Well...

(I haven't found it yet. It's unrelenting, and I'm
continuing to stress about it.)

(I decided to take care of unfinished business so that
I could make a decision today. That's what my date
with Rinne was for.)

(Before, Rinne and I didn't have the capacity to think
about other things, or do the things we did today.)

(The only time I was able to go on a date with her
was in a dream. But I denied Rinne under this same
sunset. I denied the happy world from that dream.)

I decided. I'm going to have the resolve to keep on
going.
The resolve?
You told me before, Shido. Let's go home together.
Yeah, I did. But you...

(I couldn't finish the sentence. Rinne couldn't come
home. She was alone. Disappeared, leaving me behind.)
Don't look so sad, Shido. You're making me sad.

But aren't you going to say it again? That you can't
come home with me. That you can't stay with me!

(The things that were going through my head were
slipping out of my mouth. The emotions that I
repressed were overflowing.)

I don't want it! I remember now! That you existed.
That you left me. That... you protected me!
...Shido.

(Once I let it out, I couldn't stop. But my mind was
surprisingly calm.)

(I realized it was so simple. I was scared. I was
scared that the person I knew would disappear once
again.)

Shido, you're too kind. That's why you carry it all by
yourself.
...Here we go again.
Again?

Both Maria and Marina said that to me. That... I'm too
nice.
I see... Those two must be watching you closely, then.

No... It's not that... I'm not nice. I... I just want
to be with you guys!
There's something I want you to remember, Shido.
Something... you want me to remember?

I love you, Shido. No matter what happens, I know
my feelings won't change.
Rinne...

But I also love everyone else. Not in a romantic way,
but the feeling isn't any different from love.

I love Tohka-chan who eats so happily. I love
Tobiichi-san who says weird things out of the blue.
I love Yoshino-chan who helps from time to time.

I love Kotori-chan who calls me One-chan. I love
Tokisaki-san who supports everyone. I love Kaguya-
chan who exaggerates when she's surprised.

I love Yuzuru-chan who always coolly speaks her
mind. I love Miku-san who is always working so hard.
I love Maria-chan since she's so similar to me.

I love everyone I've met in this world. This feeling
is undoubtedly my treasure.

You're here. Everyone's here... I feel so satisfied.
So I have to give back. Everyone's true futures.
But... That means―!
(Rinne, Maria, Marina, and Rio will disappear.)

Are you going to say the same thing as Marina...?!
Why won't anyone say it?! That they want to be with
me! That they want to be with all of us!

We're all similar. We're all annoying, with our own
burdens and our meddling. We can't stand anyone
continuing to be hurt.

Even if Eden worked out and we continued our daily
lives, an end will eventually come, just like last
time. I think you're the one who will regret it then.

So, no one wants you to stop moving. We want you to
keep on going, with our love supporting you from
behind.

What... That's not fair... You're going to leave it all
to me and just disappear...
But you're Prince Charming, right Shido?
Haha... That makes no sense.
I'm... a little mermaid.

(Rinne was smiling, but tears welled up in her eyes.
The sunset shone on her face... She was gorgeous.)

But I'm going to tell you. This time, I'm going to say
it.
Rinne?

I'll always, always love you. Even if you forget me,
I'll always love you.

So... So, please... If you can, I want you to leave me
a little space in your heart, Shido. Even if it's only
a little. Please?
But if I get out of here... I'll forget you again...!

It's still okay. Just remember me until the final
moment.

I won't forget. I'll never forget. Even if I get out of
here, I promise I'll remember you.

...Thank you, Shido. That makes me so happy... to
hear that.

"I knew it was that. The "most important thing" that
Rio-chan mentioned."

(It wasn't somewhere in the town. Because I had it
the whole time. From the day Rinne disappeared, I
had it the whole time―)
(I've made up my mind―)
I don't need this anymore.
I thought about Rio.
